summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plat 11W, page 53, of the Official Zoning Map of The City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Block 1, Gilman Park Addition from RD 5000 to BC contingent upon the recording of a properly executed, delivered and accepted Property Use and Development Agreement pertaining to such property (Petition of Harold P. and Estelle E. Hansen C.F. 284096, Hearing Examiner No. X-76-280).
